jcr:content.jcr:title: United States Senate Committee to Audit and Control the Contingent Expenses of the Senate

contentheadline.headline: United States Senate Committee to Audit and Control the Contingent Expenses of the Senate

contentrichtext.text: This committee of the [[United States Senate]] was created November 4, 1807. On January 2, 1947 its functions were transferred to the [[U.S. Senate Committee on Rules and Administration|Committee on Rules and Administration]]. ==Chairmen of the Committee to Audit and Control the Contingent Expenses of the Senate, 1811-present== *[[Michael Leib]] (R-PA) 1811-1815 *[[Abner Lacock]] (R-PA) 1815-1819 *[[Jonathan Roberts (politician)|Jonathan Roberts]] (R-PA) 1819-1821 *[[James Lanman]] (R-CT) 1821-1822 *[[Nathaniel Macon]] (R-NC) 1822-1823 *[[Horatio Seymour (Vermont)|Horatio Seymour]] (R-VT) 1823-1826 *[[Elias Kane]] (D-IL) 1826-1830 *[[James Iredell]] (D-NC) 1830-1831 *[[Nehemiah Knight]] (NR/W-RI) 1831-1835 *[[Samuel McKean]] (D-PA) 1835-1839 *[[Nehemiah Knight]] (W-RI) 1839-1841 *[[Albert S. White]] (W-IN) 1841-1842 *[[Benjamin Tappan]] (D-OH) 1842-1845 *[[Jesse Speight]] (D-MS) 1845-1846 *[[Alpheus Felch]] (D-MI) 1847-1848 *[[Isaac P. Walker]] (D-WI) 1848-1849 *[[Augustus Dodge]] (D-IA) 1849-1853 *[[Josiah J. Evans|Josiah Evans]] (D-SC) 1853-1858 *[[William Wright (politician)|William Wright]] (D-NJ) 1858-1859 *[[Andrew Johnson]] (D-TN) 1859-1861 *[[James Dixon]] (R-CT) 1861-1865 *[[B. Gratz Brown]] (R-MO) 1865-1866 *[[George Henry Williams|George H. Williams]] (R-OR) 1866-1867 *[[Aaron Cragin]] (R-NH) 1867-1870 *[[Orris S. Ferry]] (R-CT) 1870-1871 *[[Reuben Fenton]] (R-NY) 1871-1872 *[[Matthew H. Carpenter|Matthew Carpenter]] (R-WI) 1872-1875 *[[John P. Jones]] (R-NV) 1875-1879 *[[Benjamin Harvey Hill|Benjamin Hill]] (D-GA) 1879-1881 *[[John P. Jones]] (R-NV) 1881-1893 *[[Edward Douglass White]] (D-LA) 1893-1894 *[[Johnson N. Camden]] (D-WV) 1894-1895 *[[John P. Jones]] (R-NV) 1895-1903 *[[John Kean (New Jersey)|John Kean]] (R-NJ) 1903-1911 *[[Frank O. Briggs]] (R-NJ) 1911-1913 *[[John Sharp Williams]] (D-MS) 1913-1916 *[[Luke Lea (1879â€“1945)|Luke Lea]] (D-TN) 1916-1917 *[[William Howard Thompson|William H. Thompson]] (D-KS) 1917-1919 *[[William M. Calder]] (R-NY) 1919-1923 *[[Henry W. Keyes]] (R-NH) 1923-1927 *[[Charles S. Deneen]] (R-IL) 1927-1931 *[[John G. Townsend]] (R-DE) 1931-1933 *[[James F. Byrnes]] (D-SC) 1933-1941 *[[Scott W. Lucas]] (D-IL) 1941-1947 == Sources == [http://www.senate.gov/artandhistory/history/resources/pdf/CommitteeChairs.pdf Chairmen of Senate Standing Committees] [[United States Senate Historical Office|U.S. Senate Historical Office]], January 2005.
